text: Adrienne Corri (13 November 1930 â€“ 13 March 2016) was a British actress. She was known for her role as Mrs. Alexander in Stanley Kubrick's A Clockwork Orange. Corri died at her home in London on 13 March 2016 from coronary artery disease at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Adrienne Corri at HorrorStars Category:1930 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from coronary artery disease Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British stage actors Category:Actors from Glasgow
